Package model.move

Interface PieceMovement

All Known Implementing Classes:
PieceMovementImpl
public interface PieceMovement
This interface contains methods used by the pieces in order to generate the list of possible positions.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<Position>
    multipleMove(PieceDirections directions, Chessboard board, Piece piece)
    Given a Piece, a Chessboard, and a set of PieceDirections, return a list of all the positions that the piece can move to.
    List<Position>
    singleMove(PieceDirections directions, Chessboard board, Piece piece)
    This method is used by the King and Knight in order to return the list of possible position.

  • Method Details

    • multipleMove

      List<Position> multipleMove(PieceDirections directions, Chessboard board, Piece piece)
      Given a Piece, a Chessboard, and a set of PieceDirections, return a list of all the positions that the piece can move to. The function takes in a set of directions, which is a list of directions that the piece can move in.
      Parameters:
      directions - The directions the piece can move in.
      board - The chessboard that the piece is on.
      piece - The piece that is moving
      Returns:
      A list of positions that the piece can move to.

    • singleMove

      List<Position> singleMove(PieceDirections directions, Chessboard board, Piece piece)
      This method is used by the King and Knight in order to return the list of possible position. It iterates only for the piece's direction since for those pieces you don't need to iterate for the entire board.
      Parameters:
      directions - the piece's directions.
      board - the current board.
      piece - the piece.
      Returns:
      a list of position the piece can go to.
